column3:
Thanks for contributing. However:

Please use a prefixed and [meaningful commit message](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#contributor-workflow).

Please read and actually fill out the PR description, removing the template text:
> Pull requests without a rationale and clear improvement may be closed
immediately.

> Please provide clear motivation for yo
So your saying you disagree you think that its not important.

Contributions to this project are always welcome, however, PRs (regardless of the content), which have been opened without following any of the [contributor guidelines](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md), disregard PR templates and ignore feedback from maintainers are are going to be closed.\n\nIf you'd like to get started contributing, I'd suggest checking out the [
